sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.generateHint: Leave empty to auto-generate a code
sessions.createFirst: Create your first session to get started
sessions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session and all its data?
sessions.privacyWarning: Keep in mind that you don't want to share personal information. That's why you should use an identifier for your student. Also keep away from personal information in the notes as much as possible.
sessions.autoCreateInfo: A session with 3 conversations and an end grade will be created automatically. You can set dates and details later.
sessions.codeLockedWarning: The {role} code has been locked after 10 failed attempts. Generate a new code.
sessions.emailSubjectReviewer: Invitation: Grade the conversations as second reviewer
sessions.emailBodyStudent:
Dear student,

You have been invited to grade your conversations in CADANS.

Your access code is: {code}

Use the links below to open each conversation and fill in your grading:

{links}

Enter the access code when prompted.

Kind regards
sessions.emailBodyReviewer:
Dear reviewer,

You have been invited to grade the conversations as second reviewer in CADANS.

Your access code is: {code}

Use the links below to open each conversation and fill in your grading:

{links}

Enter the access code when prompted.

Kind regards

meetings.title: Meetings
meetings.noScoresYet: Fill in scores to see advice
meetings.topPlaceholder: What did the student do well?
meetings.noTipsTops: No tips or tops added yet. Use the buttons above to add feedback.

publicAccess.title: View Conversation
publicAccess.lockedMessage: The access code has been locked after too many failed attempts. Contact the session owner for a new code.
publicAccess.thankYouMessage: Your assessment has been submitted successfully.
publicAccess.thankYouClose: You can now close this window.

cookie.message: We use essential cookies to provide our services.
